name: MYSTERY HOUSE : SECRET STEALTH
description: There are lots of exciting experiences and tasks waiting for you in the game. Do you like the tasks to be solved? Do you like excitement when someone is chasing you and you need to find the key to the mystery? Then this game is for you. We are continually developing and engaging in more and more puzzles and tasks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2+ GHZ Dual Core or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
